text:
1. Page Title: A Nervous Journey

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Dark, narrow staircase; young man looks anxious.  
     Dialogue/Thoughts:  
       • Young Man: "What if I actually go through with it?"  
       • Young Man: "I’m terrified right now…"  

   - Panel 2 — Setup: Fourth floor; porters moving furniture.  
     Dialogue/Thoughts:  
       • Young Man: "Good, the flat's empty."  
       • Young Man: "Just me and her..."  

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man nervously approaches the old woman's flat, contemplating his project while feeling increasingly anxious.
